sub_title: Making IT Personal @ Pink Elephant | Empowering your workforce with the right Digital Workspace
summary:
👋🏽 Hello, my name is Yorrick!

💼 I help make IT personal as a project manager @ Pink Elephant. 

🌇 Born and raised in Gelderland (Netherlands), with a passion for developing strategies that allow companies to grow.

📚 (Previous) owner of 4 very diverse companies.
~ €𝟭 𝗺𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗼𝗻 (from 0) online turnover realized from start in competitive sports / fashion industry within 3 years. 
Realized organic growth in mailinglist of >𝟯𝗞 customers with almost € 0 budget for a local company.
Great passion for (online) growth and IT.
International Security Hall-of-Fame member of Apple, Microsoft, Rijkswaterstaat, NPO and more.

💻 Building a future as a leader in IT where I can guide a diverse team to success.

🏔 Incredibly tech-nerd in my spare time, current project: using algorithms and a camera to discover incorrect prints in my 3D printer.

💪🏽 Social Media Strategy, Online Marketing (SEO, SEA, Strategy, Core Web Vitals, EAT, Analytics, Trends, Psychology, A / B testing), ICT (Security, web development and overall affinity / knowledge), Business strategy, Connecting, Entrepreneurship.

🔗 Online curriculum vitae: https://www.yorrickhardeman.nl/?lang=en

awards.title: Cyber General
awards.description:
In een "Crack the Case"-game van Deloitte heb ik mijn kennis als Cyber Security Professional bewezen. Hieronder de onderscheiding:
"Van harte gefeliciteerd, je hebt het gemaakt tot ‘General’ in onze Crack the case game en je kunt jezelf met recht een sterke cyber security professional noemen. Dat lukt niet iedereen, dus: chapeau!"

awards.title: Top 5% contributor on the Google Translate Community
awards.description: By contributing to Google Translate in Dutch and English, I am helping people from around the world communicate better. I am proud to be part of the top 5% in the Google Translate Community, thanks for the award Google!

certifications.name: Cambridge English: Business Higher (BEC Higher/C1 Business Higher)

profile_positions.description: As a project manager I manage multidisciplinary teams to make customer projects a success. I do this by putting the right people in the right place, motivating the team, writing and executing project plans, keeping an overview and monitoring progress.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Fanorg is a young and innovation driven company in that focusses on web development. Our mission is to provide companies with the right technology to help them grow. We do this by using various online and business disciplines in combination with our passion for entrepreneurship.

We believe that when technology is used correctly, companies can maximize their impact on their industry and society as a whole. To reinforce this, we make a simple promise: aren't you growing? Then we will give you 100% money back.

We help companies dominate in the new media.

Cyber Security Hall of fame member at Apple, Microsoft, Dutch Ministry of Infrastructure and Water Management and Dutch public broadcaster, among others.

Tools and techniques we use most are:
WordPress, HubSpot, Web development (PHP, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, Critical CSS generation, Bootstrap, Laravel, JSON, Python, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, pgAdmin, PhpMyAdmin, Directadmin, Redis, Memcached, Varnish, OPcache, PWA, Service Workers).

Docker, Cloudflare, Nginx (reverse proxy), Fail2ban, CDNs, GTmetrix, Let's Encrypt, Firewalls, DNS.

Google Ads, Google My Business, Google Shopping, Google Lighthouse/PageSpeed Insights (User-centric performance metrics), Facebook Ads (& -Pixel), WooCommerce/E-commerce general, SEO (including Structured Data), SEA, marketing automation, social media management, conversion optimization, A/B testing, MailChimp.
profile_positions.title: Founder, Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Survive Store hanteert een methode voor supply chain management waarbij Survive Store geen goederen op voorraad houdt maar de klantbestellingen en verzendgegevens overdraagt aan de fabrikant die de goederen vervolgens rechtstreeks naar de klant stuurt.
Deze distributiemethode als competitive advantage zorgt ervoor dat wij, samen met de lage overheadkosten, onze klanten ultiem genot van onze producten kunnen laten ervaren.
profile_positions.title: Eigenaar

profile_positions.description:
By collaborating with vital departments I'm able to organically grow a cultural foundation of Innovation.
Focusing on Innovation within our Business Model, Products, Services, Culture, Business Processes and most importantly: helping Our People Innovate on their own.
Thriving company growth and organizational consistency are the results of my actions.

📍 Owner of Idea Management Platform
📍 Owner of the Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure- goals in the global United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDG)
📍 Member of the overall Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDG) board
📍 Community Manager of Mental Health Committee
📍 Member of the Innovation Board
profile_positions.title: Innovation Catalyst
Internship Innovatie Management

profile_positions.description:
During this internship, I researched a suitable project management methodology that fits the organizational culture, the current way of working and that solves a number of business problems within the organization.
After my extensive research, I independently implemented the project management methodology using the researched software system and made project leaders responsible for further implementation with users.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanagement

profile_positions.description:
Through my knowledge and experience in the ICT industry, I contributed to the realization of the ICT-study at my own university of applied sciences.
I gave extensive feedback on a number of teaching modules by testing and reviewing them.
profile_positions.title: ICT-consultant

profile_positions.description: As an intern within the Client Loyalty Team "Corporate Clients" I am responsible for the operational control of listed companies and companies with a turnover of 250 million and more.
profile_positions.title: Accountmanager Client Loyalty Team Corporate Clients

profile_positions.description:
Tijdens deze leerzame stageperiode heb ik klanten advies gegeven op basis van hun persoonlijk wensen en hun (latente) behoeften. Ik gaf advies op basis van het huidige verbruik (data, bellen en SMS-en) van klanten en het toekomstige verbruik.
Mijn upselling-techniek omvatte onder andere het benutten van het feit dat bijna geen enkele klant zijn toestel of abonnement vrijwillig wilt "down-graden", maar vrijwel altijd wilt "upgraden".
Naast het adviseren en verkopen heb ik ook technische vragen behandeld en uiteenlopende vragen over abonnementen.
profile_positions.title: Sales Advisor

volunteer_experiences.description:
Op vrijwillige basis aangemeld voor de Raad van Advies voor de minor die ik heb gevolgd aan deze hogeschool.
Als lid van deze raad heb ik mij bezig gehouden met de vraag hoe de minor nog beter kan worden gemaakt. Op basis van de voorgaande centrale vraag heb ik advies gegeven op de gebieden zoals het aanspreken van en coaching op intrinsieke motivatie, lessen op basis van vraag en aanbod ("module's"), feedback gegeven op inhoudelijke lesstof, en andere relevante onderwerpen besproken ten behoeve van onderwijsontwikkeling.

Found a security vulnerability in the systems of Outlook (Hotmail)

Reference:
https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/security/cc308575
Found a vulnerability in the website of  the Dutch Ministry of Infrastructure and the Environment.

A reflected cross-site scripting issue was addressed in the website of Apple.

Reference:
https://support.apple.com/nl-nl/HT207627

Another vulnerability was discovered by me for the second time in only a few days. This time, a serious vulnerability was discovered in the competition page of Bueno (Ferrero SA/NV) that ran in four different countries. This vulnerability revealed personal data of over a thousand winners. Personal data included hashed passwords, phone numbers, first- and lastnames, genders, email addresses, time of creation, prize type, country of origin and much more.
Thanks to the friendly customer service this issue was quickly resolved. This shows that trusting and accepting help of ethical hackers can be scary, but contributes to the security and privacy of the society. Thanks Ferrero for resolving this the right way!

Found an exploit in a competition page of Bueno (Ferrero SA/NV) that made it possible to generate an infinite amount of winning tickets. Abusing this exploit allowed guaranteed winning of more than 1200 prices including a trip to Buenos Aires in Argentina for two persons which included flights, a hotel, an accommodation and a travel budget. Total amount of all prices combined was over €70.000,-

Found a vulnerability in the website of the Dutch public broadcasting organization: NPO.
NPO is a Dutch public broadcasting organization that administers the public broadcasting service in the Netherlands.

Reference:
https://over.npo.nl/responsible-disclosure-hall-of-fame

Found a vulnerability in the Dutch website of the SBS Broadcasting
SBS Broadcasting is a European broadcasting group, operating commercial television, premium pay channels, radio stations and related print businesses in Northern, Western and Central and Eastern Europe.
SBS has broadcasting services in Scandinavia (Denmark, Norway and Sweden), Belgium, Bulgaria, Greece, Hungary, The Netherlands, and Romania.

Serious vulnerability discovered in the website of Simpel Media where malicious code could take over the whole website and potentially serve malicious programs to the visitors.
Also all database entries, including personal data, were visible because of a SQL injection.
Simpel Media is part of Endemol Shine Group.
Endemol Shine Group (which is owned by Apollo (50%) & 21th Century Fox (50%)) is one of the largest international television producers.

Found a vulnerability in the of the Dutch public broadcasting organization: NPO.
NPO is a Dutch public broadcasting organization that administers the public broadcasting service in the Netherlands.
Vertalen van een boekhoudsysteem, van Engels naar Nederlands.
Contributed to InvoiceNinja, an open source invoicing and time tracking applications, by fixed several major and minor bugs.
